titles.title: In All Things We Give You Thanks

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In all things we give You thanks.
We give You thanks and thanksgiving.
At all times, in everything, we give You thanks.
We give You thanks. (2x.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In the middle of the darkness,
In the valleys of our lives,
We lift up songs of worship,
For Your goodness cannot be denied.
